title: Client stuck at authenticating
body:
I just finished a game of league then the client said it was trying to reconnect to the league servers. After that I closed the client and now it won't let me log back in or stays stuck at authenticating.

update:Restarted computer and no dice.

replies.body: same problem i was almost uninstalling and reinstalling...even submitted a ticket
I reinstalled :/ did nothing, don't waste your time..
sigh its happening to me too . feels sad man
Probably a server side issue then RIP
I have the same problem as u
This afternoon's login issues should be resolved now!

Network Operations â€“ 3 minutes ago
We're aware of a problem causing login attempts to fail, and are working on a fix.
**_That's problem are they fixing right now?_**
Notice that this thread was posted 2 hours ago. And others have been having this issue all day. Get off your high throne.
